name: Nightmare (demophobic III)
description:
As a child I had a recurring nightmare: there was an innumerable carnival crowd leading to a monumental stable box. I was a little lost but pushed by the flow towards it. In front of it the crowd began to pull ropes and open the box. Inside there was a gigantic ogre full of colors and smallpox starving and licking his lips; the crowd began to move away as I stood alone in front of the ogre, the size of his shoes, and then the hunt began... The massive crowd who lined up as 2 magnetic blocs, lurking, clucking and screaming, was even more frightful than the 3 headed ogre... and we never run as fast as we want in dreams.

This is the first of 3 on this nightmare, and my giveaway for the 500 milestone.

Aquatint etching.
